title: Basic Setup
desc: Default setup with user basic interaction (panning and zooming).

title: Development Setup
desc: Running the JavaScript in a modern browser without building from the source code.

title: Linking Panels
desc: Link views by adding a listener to the main panel which updates the 'zoomed in' panel.

title: Popup Panels
desc: Clicking on features in the main panel will open up a new panel showing the feature in more detail. The panels can be resized,moved and closed

title: Table Thumbnails
desc: Use panels as thumbnails to show each region in a table of genomic locations

title: Custom UCSC Track
desc: A simple custom track, which displays a UCSC browser session

title: Database Source
desc: A custom track, which gets the genes to display from a database instead of a file

title: bigInteract Track
desc: A custom track which read UCSC bigInteract format,demomstarted custom mouseover/click

title: Tiled Image Track
desc: A simple track showing HiC images

title: Different Layouts
desc: Shows the effect of different layouts and how to layer bigwig tracks

title: Highlighting a Region
desc: Uses the range selected listener and highlights a region on the panel

title: Filter/Color Features
desc: Filter and color features based on their metadata

title: Drag and Drop
desc: Drag and drop menu items to add tracks to the panel and also to swap tracks between panels

title: Tool Tips
desc: Use the mouse over listener to add custom tooltips to features

title: Basic Custom Track
desc: Basic custom tracks in which features are hard coded and just drawn as rectangles

title: Drawing Features
desc: A custom track which draws each feature as an oval
